Henry was writing a story for his English class. But he had trouble making progress on it. He kept criticizing his ideas. And after several hours, he only had a few sentences on his paper. But Henry could not help being so critical.

Johnny had been saving his money for a while. He had his eye on a new set of sneakers. They were expensive, but he really wanted them. He must have cut every lawn in the neighborhood to get the money. When he finally bought his sneakers, he was so excited.

Ever since their birth, Andy, Paul and Nick did everything together. They even graduated from the same college with the same degrees. The triplets lived together and worked together. One morning, feeling very ill Andy went to the doctor, One week later he was dead, and Paul and Nick felt forever lost.

John decided to try online dating. John made a profile with his photo and a personal description. After about a day, John got a message from another user. She wanted to know if they could meet up. Now, six months later, John and that girl are engaged!
Tim was very judgmental. He always talked about people's clothes. If the clothes looked bad, he laughed. One day someone made fun of Tim's clothes. Tim was never judgmental again.
Tom's computer started slowing down. He tried a few software fixed but nothing worked. Tom decided to buy more ram. He got what he needed online at a cheap price. He replaced it himself easily.

Coach Bill was going to win the State Championship for his boys. They made it to the final game. However, the final game would be their greatest challenge. Coach Bill gathered his players and encouraged them to play hard. With help from their coach, the boys won.

When I was younger we liked to play Hide n Seek. Me and my friends hid everywhere in my huge house. We would play for hours on end. We hid in dozens of different rooms. It was very exciting when you found someone after searching for a long.

I kept cold drafts out this winter by covering the windows. I measured the windows to see what size plastic I needed. I cut the plastic with a knife to fit the windows. I taped and stapled the plastic to the windows. Using plastic is how I kept the cold drafts out this winter.

Jill's dad found her a car for cheap. It needed a new engine put in, but the car came with the new engine. Jill and her dad worked hard to put the engine in. Then they put the necessary fluids in and started the engine. Jill was happy to have helped her dad fix her own car.

Megan went for a ride in a hot air balloon. While high in the sky, she was amazed at how beautiful it was. She looked up to the clouds and saw that her balloon was on fire. She screamed for help, worried that she would get hurt. As she passed a big, tall tree, she jumped into it to save herself.

Kate's space heater broke. She needed a new one to warm her bedroom. She went to the Walmart near her home. She found one on sale for $10 less than it was online. Kate was very happy to save money and to have a new heater.

Sasha is a 3 year old Staffordshire Terrier. Kristian is her 10 year old human. They love to go on long walks. Sasha loves it most when Kristian throws her ball for hours. Sasha and Kristian are wonderful together.
I was awaiting an important package. But for some reason, it was never packaged or sent. I was told it would arrive in 3 days. But they gave me a $15 gift card. And I felt a little bit better.

Craig was having a small party. His fat friend didn't find a place to sit. He wound up finding a chair tucked in a faraway corner. He sat on it and fell right to the floor and was embarrassed. Craig tried to explain that the chair was broken to begin with.

I ate at least one granola bar everyday. And I thought they were healthy. But I realized they were much different from candy bars. And eventually I stopped eating them. And I decided to make my own healthy granola bars instead.
Jim went to a yard sale They were selling a lot of items. He went to the cd section. He found a nirvana album. He purchased it

George entered a dance contest. He expected that everyone had the kind of energy that he has. George danced with all his might, and frightened the other dancers. The other dancers decided that he was too hyped. George was removed from the premises.
Cora loved babies. She decided to try to be an obstetrician. Then she wanted to take a more holistic approach. She did some more studying. Soon Cora decided to be a midwife!

Due to the recent rains, the grass in my yard grew very tall. My neighbor told me to cut it as it looked unsightly. I refused, so he brought out his lawnmower and cut it for me. Then he sent me a bill for $20 for the mowing job he did. I refused to pay the bill.
I went to the park the other day. I saw my friend playing basketball. He wanted me to play with him. We played a game of twenty one. I narrowly beat him then went home.

Rachel wanted to learn how to bike. Her mother said she could but had to use training wheels. Rachel went around the block just fine with the training wheels. Finally she got to take the wheels off. Rachel felt so free.
Tom was going out at night. He wasn't sure how cold it would be. He decided to wear a light coat. Once out Tom realized it was too cold for that. Tom eventually went home early.
Sam loved his wife. They had been together for years. Sam's wife got cancer. There was no way to cure it. Sam suffered for years with her.

Billy was on his 45 minute break from work. He decided to relax at the employee lounge. He grew thirsty. Billy needed to decide between orange soda or pineapple. Billy decided to go for the pineapple soda.
A man learned to count cards. He would play with his friends all of the time. He always took all of their money. They found out that he always cheated. They never played with him again.

Billy couldn't stop talking in class. The teacher had to stop teaching us so she can hear Billy. Kane's headache got worse from the talking. She immediately got out of her seat and smacked Billy. Although Billy didn't mind, Kane got suspended.

Amy wanted to finish her book. It was almost time to return it to the library. Amy decided to pretend to be sick to buy time. Her mother was skeptical of her illness. In the end her mother allowed her to stay home from school.

Lucy forgot to bring her lunch to work. She decided to go buy something. The only nearby restaurant was closed. She decided to just skip lunch and eat a big dinner. When she got home she realized she forgot to buy anything for dinner.
Jill was eating lunch at school. A girl looked at her ugly. Jill threw her pizza at her. The other girl threw food back. Eventually everyone got involved.

Jerry was walking through the supermarket. He saw that the supermarket had a sale on pasta. The night before Jerry watched a cooking show about to make pasta. Jerry bought the pasta and went home. When Jerry got home, he made his pasta and was quite happy.
Tom hated playing football. He was good at it. They forced him to play. Tom decided to throw the big game. He was finally kicked out of the team.
Susan was in her math class. She had a substitute teacher today. Susan decided to ditch class. She thought that she wouldn't get caught. Her teacher found out and gave her detention the next day.

Ella grew up in the cold Northeast, and hated it. When she finished school, she went to work in Fiji for a year. She thought the constant high heat sounded like paradise. But soon she found that sweating all day was very miserable! In the end, she was actually happy to come home to the cold!
Joe was feeling tired and sad. So he decided to drink some coffee. He felt a lot more energetic. And he was able to get lots of work done. But hours later, he was even more tired and sad.
Suzy wanted something different with her hair. She decided to buy a boxed dye. When Suzy was done she loved her color. Her friend liked it so much she bought a box. Suzy wanted to it again.
Jake loved going to the library. This weekend he was particularly excited. They got a new selection of science fiction books. Those are Jake's favorite. He took several home.
Mary had an important interview. It was for her dream job! She practiced her interview skills. She also polished up her resume. Mary was so excited for her interview!

Ally's husband told her he was cheating on their marriage. Ally became very upset. She decided to book a trip to Fiji to get away. While she was there, she met a beautiful younger man. They fell in love and Ally decided to stay in Fiji.

Adam went to a bicycle shop to look at bicycles. He saw that an expensive new model had just arrived at the shop. The salesman made an impressive sales pitch to Adam. Adam felt like he deserved this bicycle. He rode away on the new bike as happy as he could be.
Tori loved cake. She went to a fancy bakery to get some. She could not decide between two flavors of cake. Finally, she selected the green tea flavored cake. She hated it.
Jim lost his hat at the train station. He put up posters of his hat. After a week, someone called Jim. She had found his hat on a bench. She returned it him and he bought her dinner to say thank you.
Keenan had gotten in trouble at school. His teacher had a meeting with his parents. Keenan's parents were not very happy. They scolded and punished Keenan. He began to improve his behavior.

Brad can never find the remote in his house. Whenever I go over there to watch a game we search for hours looking. I told him to get a beeper to put on it so he can find it. He never listens to anything I say so he won't do that. Next time I'm there I'm just going to bring a remote.

Tricia thought it would be nice to invite Susan to her wedding, So she handed over an invitation. Susie looked at it and gave it back. She was not amused. Susie had no interest in going to the wedding.
We had a family party last weekend. We used a speaker hooked up to a smartphone. The speaker died as it had not been charged. The tv volume was broken. We found an iPad dock and used that.

Roger was riding his bike to work like he usually does. Roger used the bike path and followed all the traffic rules. A car veered close to Roger, the driver was unaware on his phone. The car turned and struck Roger on his bike! Roger was okay though he only got a few bruises.
Neil was visiting Israel. He joined an organized tour. They took him to many historical places. Neil learned a lot about Middle Eastern culture. He was glad he had joined a tour group!
Ethan didn't know how to give his whole heart to a church. He really wanted to go all in. He decided to pray for direction. He prayed for help. He received an answer.

I used to have 3,000 books selling on Amazon. After my stroke in 2011 I could not keep the collection. I was down to 200 books. Today I went and closed listings for six more books. Soon I will be out of this business.

Ellen was unlucky enough to have been hit by lightning last week. It was on a tuesday when she was patching her roof. It hit right beside her and she felt the force of it. She was hurt and rushed to the hospital. Luckily she is said to be on her way to a full recovery.

In high school, kids teased Tameka because she had short hair. Now Tameka gets a weave in her hair. One evening she went to the beauty salon and asked for a weave. Her beautician put fake hair on her head that extended to her waist. A month later she removed the fake hair and was called a fake queen.

Tom's bike was stolen recently. He filed a police report but they didn't give him much hope. One day he found it at a pawn shop. It had special markings he made on the frame. Tom was able to prove it was his and get it back.

Gina was talking to some cool kids. A cute guy named Josh walked over and spoke to them. He looked at Gina and spoke directly to her. Her long time crush Jamie had never spoken to her. She decided she definitely liked Josh more than Jaime.
Faith loved to bake. She made a pumpkin pie for her family. They ate slice after slice. The pie was gone in an hour. Faith got to work baking another one.

My nephew's wife is very obese. She talks about dieting but overeats. Last weekend she posted on FB she was going to a feast in the city. She ate a good meal at an Italian restaurant. I think she is not afraid of being embarrassed.

Ted bought a new fishing boat. He brought it or onto the lake and began to fish. All of a sudden the boat started to fill with water. Ted's new boat sank and Ted had to swim to shore. Ted went to the boat store and demanded a refund.

Doug wanted to give his wife a gift. Doug's wife is obsessed with using tweezers to remove hair. He heard of a machine called an epilator that plucks hair by the root. He found an epilator in the store and bought it. She thought that the tweezer machine was the best gift ever.
Liam needed a new computer. He had to decide between a Mac and a PC. He went to Bestbuy to check out the computers. They had a big sale on PCs. Liam decided to go with a PC.
Lisa loved designing clothes. She always drew them a lot. Yet she wanted to actually make them. She got a sewing machine as a result. She made her first dress immediately.

Jon's grandma showed him her gingerbread creation. Jon was wide-eyed and wanted to taste it. Jon's grandma said the gingerbread house was just for looks. That night, Jon snuck a piece of the gingerbread house. He spit it out, discovering it was assembled with real glue.

Martha was scrolling through her Twitter feed. Suddenly she spotted an obscure looking video from her favorite band. She clicked on the link and discovered a new song. She was so excited about the new music and loved the song. She immediately started sharing the link on her personal accounts.

I went to the store to purchase a lottery ticket. Once there, I was given a five dollar scratch off. I went home, scratched the ticket off and jumped with glee. I won some money! Quickly, I took it back to the store to get my reward.

Kate thought there were going to be 3 extremely hot days. But the 95 degree heat dragged on four days. She checked the weather to find out the temperature for the next day. The weather man was predicting a fifth day of 95 degree weather. Kate was so shocked she dropped her mobile phone.
Ken needed a ride to work. He asked his friends if someone could take him. One agreed to do so. Ken offered to pay him for gas or something. His friend declined and told him to pay it forward.

Jamey was at the beach with his parents. His dad tried to teach Jamey to swim. He picked up Jamey and threw him into the water. Jamey panicked and started flailing about. He realized the water was only about a foot high and felt silly.

Tony took his friends to the arcade for his birthday. They played games for many hours. They stayed until they'd spent all their quarters. They walked home and talked about their favorite games. They agreed to save their money and go back next week.

Sam was DJ at a wedding last week. They kept asking him to play the same songs over and over again. He got frustrated and told them he wouldn't anymore. The people requesting them got equally upset. Sam didn't budge and played other music instead.

Jose loved to read under a maple tree in his yard. One day, a very bad storm hit Jose's town. The maple tree in the yard fell over from the storm's wind. Jose was sad he lost his favorite place to read. Seeing Jose's sadness, his mother helped him plant a new maple tree.

Gina liked taking her dog on walks. Her dog would snap and growl at other dogs on these walks. Gina wanted to do something about this. So she started trying to socialize her dog more with others. After a while, her dog started to act more friendly to other dogs.

I was doing an mTurk hit on images. I had to look at 200 images and make judgements. The task was simple. However, I had to wait 3 seconds for each photo to load. This made the task infuriatingly slow.

I'm so glad that today is Friday. After today there is no more work or school. Tonight I will go out to a bar with my friends. Tomorrow we get to sleep late and have fun all day. It will not matter if I want to be lazy tomorrow.
Bob sat around all day. And he thought he was useless. But he saw a lost dog outside of his house. And he decided to take care of him. Bob was happy to make a difference in dog's life.

Lars loves the TV show Big Brother. He has watched many seasons of the show. He decided that he wanted to be a contestant on the show. He applied to be cast on the show with a video. He was selected to be a contestant based on his casting video.

Farrah was driving home from school. A person was riding a bicycle in front of her. He continued to move slowly. Farrah looked away for a second. She didn't notice that he stopped and she ran over him.
Tina was invited to the prom. She did not know how to dance. Her father told her he would teach her. They practiced every night. Tina's date said she was the best dancer in the room.
Renee has a baby. One day, Courtney asked to hold the baby. Courtney did not know how to hold Renee's baby. Renee showed her how to hold the baby. Courtney was happy to learn how to hold a baby.

My son has been asking me for a new dog for weeks. I finally decided to say yes to the idea. We went to the local pet store and bought a boxer. The dog is full of energy and needs walked every day. My son loves taking his dogs on walks and I am glad we got him.

Cory started manipulating photos and making graphics in high school. He went on to college to get his graphic design degree. He worked very hard for years, and open his own shop. Now he has a booming business and calls it Push. Cory has led a successful life.

Cullen headed outside to go for his evening walk. He walked about a mile and was heading home. Rain clouds suddenly started to form overhead. Cullen hurried, trying to beat the rain. The rain started just as Cullen walked through the door.
Briana was a cheerleader at her school. She was on the top of the pyramid. One day she slipped while climbing up. She fell and dislocated her knee. She had to sit out for six months.
Nick and Kay went to the same school. They were good friends. There was a big math test coming up soon. Nick was bad at math, but Kay was good at it. Kay helped Nick study for the test.

Mary felt that schools did not teach foreign languages very well. She searched for a way to use foreign language in everyday life. Schools with total immersion programs sent her applications. Mary decided that her social life would still be in English. Mary moved to Europe on her aunt's invitation.

Glenn is 60 years old and overweight. He likes to eat a lot of candy. He noticed he was really thirsty and going to the bathroom a lot. This was unusual for him so he went to the Doctor who ran some tests. The tests has revealed that Glenn has developed diabetes.

Barry worked for his accounting firm for over 20 years. Recently, Barry was interviewed for the CFO position. Barry was told he would have an answer within two week. Barry was anxiously awaiting the news, when his cellphone rang. Barry was elated to discover he was the new CFO for the firm.

Walt knew he'd had too much to drink. He left his car parked in front of the bar and walked home. Crossing the avenue, another drunk driver almost hit him. He yelled at the guy, chasing the car down the street. Winded, he fell to his knees, vowing to stop drinking for good.

Martha goes to the skating rink every Wednesday. It's the same night the roller derby team practices. Martha tries to imitate the way they skate. Next time they hold tryouts, Martha is going to go. Until then, she's going to practice.

Kyle lived in a small town in Arkansas. His town was on a fault line. One day he felt his house shake. It was the aftershock of an earthquake from another town. Kyle was weirded out but glad it was just the aftershock.

May asked her boyfriend to do the dishes. But he kept putting it off. He said they'd be done by the time she woke in the morning. She slept in, then went to check. He hadn't even loaded the dishwasher!

Derek was eating dinner at a nice restaurant. He left his table to go to the restroom. Inside the restroom he saw a sign that said employees must wash hands. Derek waited and waited, but no employee showed up to wash his hands. Derek clearly did not understand the sign.

Ginger and John are 40 and started dating when they were 13 years old. They are still not married and have 3 children together. Their oldest child was scheduled to marry in November. Ginger demanded they get married before their child. John finally proposed and they got married in June.

Moran was up all night trying to finish an essay. He had wished he started earlier instead. Time was running out and Moran was frantic. Finally in ten minutes he was done. When Moran hit send he felt relieved.
Jada was thirsty. She opened her fridge to get a drink. Then she saw that there was nothing to drink! Jada walked to the store to buy some Kool Aid. Then she came home and had her drink.

She turned up the television to drown out the background noise. Her brothers continued to yell and play wrestle with each other. Finally she got so upset that she yelled out for them to stop. First one then the other blinked and looked at her. Then they came to sit next to her on the couch and all watched tv.

Dan was not a very good cook. He had watched a video on how to cook steak. He wanted to put his abilities to the test. He went to store to buy the biggest steak they had. He brought it home and cooked it perfectly.

Arnold came home one day and noticed his old pet rabbit hadn't eaten. He held the rabbit in his arms, and pet it softly. Arnold's wife sat down next to them, and they talked about the rabbit. While they were reminiscing, Arnold felt the rabbit grow still. Tears fell as Arnold held his pet for the very last time.
Leah put on her summer dress. She twirled the dress around. The dress felt starchy. She washed the dress with socks. The dress felt better after that.

Dan was 9 and his brother Rob was 5. On Rob's birthday he received a Power Wheels truck. Dan was shocked since he always wanted, but never got one. Dan asked his dad why Rob got one and he didn't. Dan's dad explained Dan was too old for a Power Wheels truck.

Beatrice is almost as attractive as her sister. Devin prefers her sister, but wouldn't say no to Beatrice. Devin did everything he could to get noticed by her sister. Only Beatrice noticed, so Devin asked out Beatrice. Devin and Beatrice had a nice night together.

Missy went for a walk. While on her walk she saw a skinny dog. The dog had no collar and look like it was starving. Missy coaxed it to follow her and brought it to her house. Missy nursed the dog back to health.

Ellen was dissatisfied with the lack of greenery in her apartment. She purchased a mint plant and put it by a window. Its growth was temperamental and it leaned when not watered. In time it grew to a respectable size and Ellen used its leaves. Ellen liked the experience, and purchased several herbs thereafter.

Ana was nervous about her wedding night. She changed into her nightgown and crept into bed. Then she turned cautiously to her new husband. She couldn't believe what she saw. Her new husband had fallen asleep!

Noe had an eye for detail and decided Charles didn't. Charles made mistakes before, but this was his big one. Charles posted a link to a website with a misspelled word. Noe called an emergency meeting and showed off the mistake. Charles said facebook published a cookie, there was no error online.

Lucy and Gina were at the pool. Lucy wasn't a very strong swimmer. She was in over her head and panicked. After a struggle she was able to swim to the edge of the pool. She nearly drowned, but she decided to continue swimming.
Tim was trying to buy water. He was debating between city and spring water. He studied about this online. He learned a lot about water. He ultimately decided to buy spring water.

On Friday I had to take the MCAT which I needed to do well on. I've wanted to be a doctor since I was five. I completely blanked when I got to the test. But after a while the information came back to me. I completed the test and found out I got an amazing score.
Eliza wanted to win the sweepstakes. She entered many times. When the names were drawn she was nervous. Finally the names were called. Hers was picked.

I was dating a girl. She was dropping hints about wanting to kiss me. When I dropped her off at her house, I leaned in for the kiss. She decided to kiss me! Alas, her breath smelled like garlic chutney!

Kermit was a twin who grew up without a father. He never seemed to understand how to treat others very well. Sometimes he stole possessions because other people made him feel bad. He was caught stealing alcohol in a far away town. His friends came and saved him when he thought no one would.

I am a loud yawner. I take a deep breath and make a loud noise. Tonight I yawned while my wife was in the kitchen. She asked if there was an animal in the apartment hall. I said that was just my yawn.
The dog was very tiny. She was a chihuahua. She had a litter of puppies. I asked how she was nursing them. They said she had very tiny puppies.

Shawn had always looked up to his dad. He thought he was the greatest man to walk the planet. One day on his way home from school he saw his dad's car. It was outside his teacher's house. Shawn never spoke to him again after catching him having an affair.
My son is a toddler. Sometimes he used to bite his friends at daycare. Daycare told us about him biting. I told my son to use his words instead of biting. He stopped biting his friends so much.

Kirk went to the bank to deposit a check. He was very late for work but stood in line anyway. The line moved very slowly. To pass the time he took a lollipop in one of the bowls. He had finished the lollipop when it was finally his turn.

Ziggy the dog needed to take prozac for his anxiety issues. His family did not think Ziggy would like taking a pill. They hid his pill in a hollowed out piece of string cheese. Ziggy happily gobbled it up. Now all his medication is hidden in string cheese.
Tanya has been practicing on her violin. She's still new to playing. Her older brother plays violin. Tanya wants to play just as well as he does. Tanya continues to practice diligently.

Mr Johnson went to the store for some shopping. He saw his neighbor there with her son. The son wanted a toy but they couldn't afford it. Mr Johnson bought the toy and put it on the porch of the neighbor. The neighbor saw it and thanked Mr Johnson for his kindness.

Em was a pretty farm girl who'd just been invited to prom. She worked hard on the farm, but couldn't earn enough for a prom limo. Then her dad thought of a way to help his dejected daughter. He saddled the family's two horses and rode Em to the high school. Em arrived at her prom very romantically after all - on horseback!

Amy loved visiting at her cousin's house each summer. She loved their chic decor and the escape from her strict home. Here, Amy was allowed to eat what and where she wanted. Alone in the living room, Amy spilled a grape soda on the white sofa. She flipped the cushion over and didn't say a word about it.

Charles intended to run for mayor in his city. His rival Ron was a bitter rival. Ron used dirty tactics to try to discredit Charles during the election. Charles was tempted to use similar strategies, but resisted. In the end, Charles won the election and became mayor.
I was playing golf with a couple friends. I had lost my chipping wedge. We could not find it at our previous holes. I went to the clubhouse. They gave me one for free.
Cindy was mad at her puppy. It ruined her couch. And it damaged her coffee table. But Cindy realized it was her fault. She didn't train it properly.

Hank and George were nervous. They'd just been partnered in a diving competition. They had only dived together a few times. The crowd was quiet as they prepared to dive. They slid into the water flawlessly!
Kary Kary was laughing bitterly. She had a new partner on the job. Kary had worked hard to get where she was. She was bullied in school. Now her tormentor was her superior.

Lily hadn't seen her father since she was young. She reached out to him and set up a meeting. She was very nervous, but also a bit excited. She met her dad at a local restaurant. Lily and her dad spent hours catching up and had a great time.

Ken collected leaves and flowers on nature walks. When he got home, he pressed them between the pages of his diary. One day he picked a pretty, shiny dark green leaf. What he didn't know was that the leaf was poison ivy! Poor Ken had to get treatment at his local Urgent Care center!

Ted had a fear for cats. He had been afraid of them since he was a small child. One day he visited his sister and saw she had adopted a cat. He was afraid to sit near the cat even when it was asleep. Ted cut his visit to his sister's house short to avoid the cat.

My 99 year old friend Ben sits on the bench a lot. Yesterday he told me he had enrolled in some courses. Brandeis has courses open for senior citizens. I asked him why he wanted to go to so many courses. He said if he keeps busy he won't die.

I bought a pair of goldfish from the animal store. Since my garage had a lot of space, I placed it there. I needed to feed it but I didn't know how much. I assumed they needed a lot and poured a quarter of the bottle. The fish were dead during the next day.

Today I went to the beach. I was feeling great at first, however then I started getting sick. My head was throbbing and I needed to leave. When I got home I took Motrin. Thankfully when I took it, I was cured.

Sandy went to her granddaughter Meredith's house today. Whenever she goes there, she watches TV. Meredith was upset because her grandmother only watched TV. She told Sandy that she was not welcome in her house anymore. Sandy cried all night because she felt betrayed by her granddaughter.

Lester has just started a new job at an upscale salad shop. His first position is to chop the prepared salads. Lester diligently chops salads all day. At the end of the day he is tired but satisfied. Lester is happy with his new job at the salad shop.

John is 8 years old and was brushing his teeth. Suddenly John realized he was missing a tooth. John checked his mouth in the mirror. Indeed he was missing a tooth. John looked around and found his tooth on his pillow.

George wanted to be fireman. He signed up to join the local fire department. George had to go through extensive training. He failed training on the first round. But on his second try he was able to pass and join.

Yesterday I noticed I was not getting much email. I checked and found several emails were put into my spam bin. There were personal emails as well as ones from legitimate companies. I found out how to tell gmail to not declare emails as spam. I am now getting my regular emails.
Bob wanted to go to Paris. He booked a ticket and packed his bags. The flight was delayed. Luckily, the airline offered Bob a refund. Bob accepted the refund and never went to Paris.

Chuck was driving his convertible to the store to buy fruit. A deer caused him to swerve off the road. He then ran into an apple tree. Apples rained down from the branches. With his car full of apples he no longer needed to go to the store.

Adam went to study in England for a semester. His host family drank tea constantly. Adam had never even tried tea, but he decided to sample it. To his surprise, he ended up enjoying it! Adam started having tea with his host family often.

Tom was doing a construction project. He was getting supplies at Home Depot. He noticed a lot of people outside willing to help. They all offered to do it at cheap prices. Tom didn't realize it was illegal.

Jim went camping with friends. They went hiking in the afternoon and returned very tired. When they made it back to camp, they began to start a campfire. While the fire grew, it began to spread up a nearby tree. The group grabbed a fire extinguisher and put the fire out.
I really needed new foundation. My current one was bad. I went to Sephora to try some one. Finally I found the perfect one. I was happy I purchased it.

Tim took out his CD player and popped in his favorite album. He listened to the first song. Once the song ended it started up again. Tim realized that the repeat button was stuck. He didn't bother to fix it until the song played the third time.
Sam was always impulsive. His wife sent him to get groceries. Sam went to the store and got sidetracked. He wound up buying several things he didn't need. His wife was upset with him.

Tom was a bull rider by trade. He would wake up early every morning wanting to ride. He would try to get on a bull as soon as he could. He would ride until the sun went down. Every night he couldn't wait for the next day to ride once again.

The weather was very hot. Johnny's fan broke last year and had not been replaced. He went to the store and discovered they were sold out of fans. Johnny called his sister to see if she had a spare fan. She did and Johnny was able to cool down on the hot day.

Gina came home from school and went to her room. Outside the room she could hear voices inside. She walked in to see her sisters in her room. The little one was swinging from the gold ball on the top of a pole. Gina yelled at them, and they ran out of her room.

Uma was nine months pregnant. It wasn't long before she was ready to give birth. Uma's husband rushed her to the hospital. After many hours, the baby was born. Uma was happy to finally start a family.
Kelley wore her favorite t shirt. She was running through the walkway with it. Then all the sudden it got caught. It ended up ripping. Kelley was not happy.

Phil took a vacation to Amsterdam. He loved art, and wanted to see the Van Gogh museum. He had to wait in line in the rain for over two hours. He finally got into the museum, and enjoyed every minute there. He decided to go again on his next trip to Amsterdam.

Kim wanted a Barbie dollhouse for Christmas. She put it on her list to Santa and hoped she would get one. On Christmas morning there was a large box under the tree. She opened the box and discovered a Barbie dollhouse. Kim played with her dollhouse the whole day.

A mother and her son decided to take a vacation to Tennessee. They booked a stay on a luxurious houseboat. They were upset to find everything covered in mold. It was over 105 degrees and the air conditioning did not work. When the toilet backed up, the two moved to a hotel.

Anita teaches math in Oaxaca Mexico. But teaching conditions are poor and her pay is too low. Therefore, Anita joined the teachers' protests in the plaza. The police showed up Saturday morning to dismantle the crowd. They fired warning shots, but one hit Annita and killed her.

We boarded the military truck. We were handed a bunch of paint balls. We loaded them into our pretend guns. We rode through the forest, shooting men dressed as zombies. We laughed and enjoyed the ride.

I couldn't control my anger very well. My parents would yell at me, and I ran to my room. I buried my head in a pillow and screamed. I threw my pillow and hit it hard. I tried to express my anger without them knowing.

Max was visiting his sick Grandpa for the first time in years. He couldn't do much but sit in a chair and watch the news. He was even having trouble speaking words to Max. Max brought him his dinner and his grandpa wasn't responding. He waited to see Max before passing away and Max knew that.
I was bored one day. So I decided to listen to a mixtape. One of the songs was so good I stood still. I ran to the store to buy it. Thankfully there was still one left.

Howard was bothered by a single wasp buzzing around on his porch. He decided to try and hit it with an electrified fly swatter. Instead of killing it, though, getting hit only made it angry. It immediately flew directly at Howard and stung him in the face. That day he learned just how resilient wasps can be.
The other day I went for a walk in the woods. I came across a bush full of berries. The berries looked tasty so I picked them. I took them back to my place to eat them. They were so tasty.

Fiona was driving home after a long day of errands. She was close when suddenly she ran out of gas. She tried her phone but found that it was also dead. Then she decided that home was pretty close. After an hour's walk she arrived home.
Tom bought a can of soda at a drive thru. He swerved to miss a raccoon on the road. The cup fell out of the cup holder. The cup fell onto the floor. Tom's drink stained his carpet.
Cassie got an ice cream cone. It was a hot day and it started to melt. She was rushing home in the heat. The ice cream kept dripping on her arm. When she got home, she was a mess!
We went to Not Your Average Joe's last year. We had eaten a heavy lunch. Nevertheless my daughter wanted to have dinner. We did not each much, it being too early. My wife felt stuffed all night.

Parties are usually lame, but this was a new level of lame. Tim was forced to go to his nephew's party. All it was is little kids playing baby games. Tim was annoyed, but he was forced to stay because of his parents. Tim was depressed and annoyed for the rest of the day.

Dana had been having trouble getting up on time. She was late for school for the eighth time in a row. Her principal called her in for a meeting. Dana needed to be on time or she would be suspended. From then on, Dana took the effort more seriously forever.
Bill and Dawn were about to get married. Bill was waiting at the altar for quite a while. He sent his best man to find Dawn. His best man came back with bad news. Bill cried all that night.

Connie had been attracted to her coworker for more than a year. A holiday party was being arranged, and Seth would be attending. Connie was great at mixing drinks, and decided to 'wow' him. But just as she was taking him his favorite drink, she tripped. Connie was humiliated when the drink flew all over his dress shirt.
Krissy worked at a diner. The diner ran out of eggs. Krissy's boss sent her to the store for eggs. Krissy returned with the eggs. They were able to start the lunch rush fully stocked.

Lizzy became a lawyer to fight for justice. But she realized that the law had nothing to do with justice. If she was good, she won and if she wasn't, she lost. As justice was only served with skill, she quit. And she founded a charity to fight for justice instead.

The kids didn't have anything to do. They were so bored! They decided to play a game to entertain themselves. They went to the game cabinet and picked the most exciting game. They had fun for hours with it.

It was Tim's turn to kick the ball. He had been practicing at home for days. When it was rolled toward him he closed his eyes and kicked. He missed completely and kicked so hard he fell. All the other kids made fun of him and he ran to the bathroom crying.

Bae ducked into the store out of the rain. Her tennis shoes were soaking wet! Bae looked at the selection of boots the store had. She picked the first pair she saw in her size. Bae bought the boots and wore them out into the rain.

Eli heard a scary noise from the living room! It sounded like a rodent scratching or something. He rushed out to see what it was. The lid to the coffee maker wasn't down all the way. Eli watched it hiss and then put a pan on top of it.

Chase had an online math class. And he was struggling to solve a problem. He was sure he put the correct answer. But it kept saying he was wrong. After hours of struggling, his teacher said it was the website's fault.

Tom went to a concert put on by his favorite rock band. Tom had a blast at the show. After the concert, his friend told him he had a surprise for him. Tom's friend led him to an area off center stage. There, Tom personally met the members of the band!
We lived in a housing project. The place had mice. One day I saw  mouse eating bread on the table. I hit the mouse on the head with a hand broom. I was glad to get rid of this pest.
I went to a movie about global warming last night. It made me think about a lot of things. I had a big discussion with my friends. We decided to do more to help. Today, I planted a tree.

Having just been fired, Rick needed a new job as soon as possible. Rick just wanted to work, he didn't care what field the job was in. He went to every local business, but none of them were hiring. Being inventive, Rick decided to create his own job for himself. Rick started charging people to have him look over their resumes!
Tim is having a bad day. To make things worse now his car is being towed. Tim heads home hoping his luck will change. At home Tim learns his girlfriend is leaving him. What a horrible day Tim had.

Tia made pork steaks for dinner. She knew her husband liked his steak rare, so she made it rare. But later that night, her husband got very sick! Tia didn't know that pork must be fully cooked before consumption. She had accidentally made her husband sick!
Roxy had a really bad craving for food. She didn't know what to eat. She got in her car to find something to eat close. She ended up going to Mcdonald's. It was closed for the holidays.

Norman planted a tree twenty years ago. The tree was placed adjacent to his childhood home. Now he finds himself near the home while traveling. He stops by to check on the tree. Norman's tree has grown to an immense size.

Ted was a fourth grader when his dad got laid off. He packed all of his favorite toys in a box and slept on the floor. He hopped in the car and traveled to Las Vegas. He fell asleep while his dad drove across the USA. He gasped when he arrived at his new home.

Sara worked at a jewelry store. She got a commission on every sale she made. One day a gentleman came in to buy his wife a nice ring. The man purchased an expensive anniversary ring from Sara. She made a lot of commission off the sale.

I live near a university. Their football team is very good. They were playing a big game yesterday. I had to work then so I couldn't watch the game. After work, I was relieved to hear that they won the game!
Evie is on the basketball team. She is also bad at math. Her math teacher is also the coach. He gives Evie all the answers to the questions. Evie is able to pass her math tests and play basketball.

Ralph looked at his family with tears in his eyes. In two weeks, he would be evicted from his apartment. In desperation, Ralph set up a Go Fund me Account. To his surprise, donations poured in from all over. Ralph was able to keep his family in their home.

Jake wanted to quit cigarettes. He went to his local vape shop. He purchased a brand new e-cigarette. He vaped for the new few weeks. He was able to successfully quit cigarettes with his new e-cigarette.

Aya was going to the shore with friends. Her mom urged her to take a jacket. Aya didn't think she needed one, but she took one anyway. At the shore, it grew windy and chilly. Aya was glad she'd listened to her mom after all!

The new graduate had a job waiting, but had not yet started work. The job was in another town and he wanted to buy a house first. He would be able to make the mortgage payments in the future. The bank wanted him to be able to make the mortgage payments at once. He ended up having to throw away money on rent.
Carter was walking home. He saw a shortcut through the alley. The alley was dark and scary. Carter heard a noise behind him. He took off running away from the alley.
The kids had one more day of summer vacation. Their parents let them have ice cream for dinner as a treat. They were so excited! They ate two bowls full of ice cream. Then they felt very sick!

Sara was on the phone with her friend. Somehow, they ended up in an argument. Sara got upset and hung up the phone. Her and her friend didn't speak for almost a week. Finally, Sara's friend apologized.

My daughter's neighborhood friend Debbie got married last November. They were good friends since they were twelve. My daughter came up from NYC to Brighton for the wedding. An hour ago Debbie announced she was pregnant. My daughter, who has a child, is thrilled.

Glen was a geeky boy at school. He loved anime and video games, but never really talked to people. A girl in his class really liked him and invited him to sit with her. Glen was really shy and didn't want to do it. The girl took his hand at lunch and brought him to her table.

I feel joy when I do whatever I am passionate about. I found one of my passions, poker, when I was much younger. I was playing with friends while bored at college. I was instantly hooked on its puzzle solving components. I got very far in my first poker game with those friends.
Janice is feeling a little hungry. She decides she wants a snack. She eats a great big block of cheddar cheese. Janice feels much more satisfied. She is glad that she doesn't feel hungry any more.

Chip wanted to drink only fresh milk. He lived in a big urban city. He searched every store and no one carried fresh milk. Chip drove two hours out of town and found a farm. He paid the farmer big money for some very fresh milk.

Last Tuesday we tried to order takeout food. We decided on Chinese food. Both of our restaurants' phones were not working. Frustrated, we ordered pizza. Later we learned Comcast had an outage and many phone lines were down.
I almost went to my senior prom. I worked at the guidance office. The counselor wanted to introduce me to a girl. She wanted me to take her to the prom. I didn't ask her to go.

Neil had just arrived in a port city. He was on a long trip, and he was now in Tangier, Spain! He had never been in a port city before, and he loved it. The hustle and bustle thrilled him. Neil wished he never had to leave!

Jack fumed and stomped into the office. He screamed at the top of the lungs for everyone to pay attention. When there was silence, he very calmly informed them it wasn't true. He said it was important they not tell people he was unemployed. Jack's boss came out of his office and told him he was fired.

Becky went to the zoo with her friend. They walked to the back of the zoo. They saw Chimpanzees at the back of the zoo. Becky made a funny face and danced in front of the Chimp. The Chimp responded by defecating and tossing feces at Becky.

Jill was exhausted from a long day at work. She dreaded having to fix dinner for her family when she got home. When she walked in the house, she had a surprise. Her husband had fixed dinner! She was able to sit down and relax for once.

I went to the new sushi restaurant for lunch. I was given an estimated wait time of thirty minutes. While I was waiting, I ran into my boss. My boss then invited me to join her at her table for lunch. Not wanting to be rude, I joined her and her friends for lunch.

Kay had gained too much weight and couldn't fit her clothes anymore. She decided it was time to slim down. She changed her eating habits cutting out all sugar and most carbs. She increased her walks from 30 to 60 minutes a day. Kay was proud to lose 50 pounds in 4 months.

Ike decided to have a great senior summer. But his mom had other plans - she enrolled him in school! At first Ike hated the classes every day. But at college, he saw how well-prepared he was. Then, Ike silently thanked his mom.

Jenny really wanted to become a marine biologist. But as she lived in a desert, she had to leave everything behind. She packed her things and moved next to the ocean. She studied very hard and became a good marine biologist. Now she still misses her old home, but the ocean is now her new home.

Pauline always feels sleepy at client dinners. She needs to entertain clients, but she hates staying up late. One night she takes clients to a steakhouse and barely stays awake. Finally everyone goes home after eating. Pauline is extremely happy to be able to go to sleep.

Paul was a very picky eater, he would only eat his few favorite foods. This made Paul a bad guest to invite to dinner. Paul was into this girl, and she made him a tray of sushi. Even though he didn't like it, he ate it for the girl. Paul ended up really liking it, and learned to try new things.

Missy wanted to take her dog to a dog park. She looked online and found one close to her house. Missy and her dog walked to the park. Missy was surprised to see it filled with very large dogs. She decided to wait and find a park for smaller animals.

Chad recently got a new job in a restaurant. However, Chad learned that he would have to get a shot. Chad has a fear of getting shots, but he needs the job. Chad took the shot, and it was not bad. Chad was glad to have the shot ordeal over.
Jared wanted to learn to play the piano. He wasn't very good to start with. He practiced everyday after school. He improved a great deal. He can now play any song he likes.

A woman purchased some kitchen supplies and paid with a check. For whatever reason something went wrong with the check. The manager of the store called the lady up to let her know. Many weeks went by when the woman showed up unexpectedly. The embarrassed customer paid in cash to make up for the mistake.

Tom Brady is the quarterback for the New England Patriots. He is suspended for the first four games of the 2016 NFL season. The Patriots were expected to lose Sunday's opener against Arizona. Arizona was at home and the Pats had an untested qb under center. It didn't matter, the Patriots pulled off the upset.

Amy finally got her acceptance letter for college. She had worked all her life and it paid off, she was going to Yale. She knew it was expensive but her parents had been saving since birth. She told them the good news and they looked like they saw a ghost. They told her they had spent all of her money on their new condo.

Sue had a cold and needed to get well fast. She didn't want to go to work sick! She tried pills and syrups, but nothing worked. Then she stumbled upon the real cure. Chicken soup and hot tea made her well!
The man poured ketchup. The ketchup spilled over his plate. Nobody in the room seemed to care. The man set the ketchup down so hard that the bottle broke. The crowd clapped with approval.

Wanda's son brought his toy magic set to his mother. He put a metal ball into a small cup. The boy covered the cup and tapped it with his wand. When he uncovered the cup, the metal ball was nowhere to be seen! Wanda applauded her son loudly.

My Father bought some land for us to build a house on. We were gonna have the biggest house in all the county. Two weeks after buying the land he died. The people who live on the land wouldn't leave. So my mother made them keep it.

My friend Gary is an outdoorsman. In 1988 we lived next to a pond in the city. Gary inflated a boat and got out into the pond. The police came by and told him there was no boating. He was disappointed.

A woman came out of the cafe with a box. While walking by, I attempted to hold the door for her. She screamed at me because she thought I was a chauvinist. I backed away warily and went on my way. She dropped the box full of puppies and one of them died.

Sam was afraid of his mean, old neighbor, Mrs June. Sam asked his mother why Mrs June was so mean. His mother explained that Mrs June wasn't mean, just lonely. Sam thought about it, and decided to be friendlier to Mrs June. It turned out she wasn't so scary after all!

Sandra bought a bed skirt at the thrift store. When she got home it was very wrinkled from being in the bag. She couldn't find her iron so she improvised. Her mother could hardly believe how nice the bed skirt looked. Sandra didn't tell her she ironed it with her hair flat iron!

Leah worked in clothing retail for many years. She had been saving up to start her own business. Finally she was ready to open her own store. Leah opened a fashion boutique downtown. Her business was very successful.

Thomas and his parents went camping every Thanksgiving. They would live in a cabin and be thankful for each other. While Thomas was looking for firewood he got lost. He spent all day searching for his family but he was lost. After hours he finally found his family, he was truly thankful.
Arnold was scared of red ants. He hated how they almost bit him. One day he was sitting down on the grass. He felt a stinging sensation. He ended up at the hospital because of red ant bites.

Larry wanted to give his daughter a special toy. Larry looked through the toy department for several options. After searching, Larry found a cute little lamb. After purchasing the lamb, Larry got it gift wrapped. Larry was glad to have found the perfect gift for his daughter.
The man cleaned his ear. His ear still felt clogged. He went to the doctor. The doctor cleaned the man's ear. The man felt better.

Jose wanted to take his crush to the prom. Unfortunately someone else had already asked her. Jose was heartbroken. His friends all invited him to go stag with them instead. Jose had a great time at the prom with his friends.

I went to play basketball with my friends last night. We went to a new court we had never been to before. The regulars there were very good at playing basketball. We played them all night, but never won a game. We had a lot of fun playing basketball that night.

Timothy's father announced they were going to clean out the attic. Timothy grumbled because he wanted to play baseball. But his dad said everyone had to pitch in. After a couple hours, they were done. Finally, Timothy was able to go play ball.

My coworker used to drink Grand Marnier and pineapple juice. My wife was looking for a drink to try tonight. She had Grand Marnier but no pineapple juice. She did find orange pineapple juice and mixed that. She said the drink was fun.
Tom was a dog walker. He got a new client with a really big dog. Tom said he could handle it. Unfortunately the dog wound up dragging Tom around. Tom had to quit the job.

Kate is very clumsy by nature. She tends to walk slowly in hopes that she won't do something painful. Last weekend, she was in a hurry and stepped right off a curb. She twisted her ankle. She had to ice it and keep her foot up for a few days.

Tom was trying to get food. He used a coupon but it was expired. The worker felt bad and asked his manager about it. The manager let Tom use the expired coupon. Tom was very thankful and returned often.
Alice has always wanted to be a mother. She meets a man and they fall in love. She tells him she has always wanted a baby. He says he has too. Alice is happy to have a baby.

Samantha felt homesick after living abroad for several years. She decided to save some money and take a vacation. She didn't tell anyone that she was coming home for Christmas. Her family was surprised when she walked through the door. She felt relieved after the vacation.

My old computer just broke so I decided to buy a new once. There was a sale going on at Best buy for computers. I looked at everyone of them and they seem average. However, I decided to go to the Apple section and buy a Mac. Ever since I went Mac I never went back.
Carl was upset one night. He posted something somewhat personal on Facebook. Some of his friends were offended. It caused an argument in his comments section. Carl deleted the post.

Cooper took his laptop with him every where. While at work today Cooper realized he didn't have his laptop. Cooper had a lot of important work on his laptop that he needed. Cooper started looking everywhere for it. Cooper found his laptop at the coffee shop he was at earlier.

Alexa loves photography. She went to college for photography. She spent all her free time taking photos. Alexa's parents decided to buy her a camera as a graduation gift. Alexa loves her new camera and takes pictures with it daily.

One by one, the students grabbed trays from the dining hall. They slipped them under their shirts or behind their backs. They snuck out of the dining hall, unnoticed. The students used them as sleds on the snowy hill on campus! The next morning, they returned all the trays in good condition.

I heard a knock on the door a little while ago. I looked out the window and saw an old friend. He was always trouble and not fun to be around. I did not want to talk to him. I was really quiet and pretended not to be home so he left.

Ellie dreaded the new school year starting because of the costs. Ellie needed to buy expensive new uniforms and supplies. Her grandma said she would pay for everything. Ellie and her grandma bought everything Ellie needed. Ellie felt much better about the school year once she was prepared.
Jamal could barely stay awake in class. He was up all night finishing his report. While exhausted, he was glad it was over. Suddenly, the calendar caught Jamal's eye. The report was due next week.
The man had a craving. He ignored it. The craving grew. He gave into the craving. The man felt guilty.

Kelly tried to go to work early yesterday. However to her dismay, she was stuck in traffic. The traffic lasted three hours. Thankfully when it ended she was able to get to work. The bad thing was that her boss was unhappy.

The first time I started to run regularly was in high school. I was unable to play basketball or any other sport well. I tried jogging around my neighborhood. At first, my endurance was low so I was constantly out of breath. After a few months, I eventually got better and ran my mile shorter.

Gordon bought a car from a friend. They both worked on restoring the car. After the friends restored the car, they took it to a show. Gordon and his friend decided to start a business. The friends now restore cars for a living.

Liz dreaded going back to school because she had new braces. She practiced ways to cover her mouth so no one would notice. Liz kept her mouth tightly closed riding the bus to school. She entered her class and took a seat in the back. Then a classmate turned and smiled with a mouthful of braces.

John got a taxi to take him to a surf town in southern Nicaragua. The driver started driving toward John's destination. A dispute arose when the driver demanded a high fare for the trip. John and the driver started negotiating over the fare. They agreed on the fare as they had a couple of beers at a local bar.

Emily is a major gift officer at a non-profit organization. She has a pushy personality and isn't well-liked. Because of this, she doesn't earn a lot of gifts from donors. When she doesn't earn gifts, she doesn't hit her portfolio goals. Emily was recently fired because she didn't hit her goals.
Jan is taking out the trash. While walking she slips. She drops the trash all over the ground. Jan picks up the garbage she dropped. Jan was upset she fell taking out the trash.

The family was headed to the fair. Every year, the state fair was held in their city. They liked to eat sugary treats and ride rides. Then they would look at the exhibits. The fair was a fun tradition for them.

Lori thinks her husband has been drinking too much. He has been going golfing with his friends and comes home drunk. He goes out to the bars at least two nights a week. He also drinks while he is at home. Lori confronts him and he gets very angry and defensive.
Tom was at the mall with his wife. He got separated for a bit. When he found her he went up and squeezed her butt. Unfortunately it wasn't Tom's wife. Tom got slapped and apologized profusely.

I woke up to a strange noise last night. I was very confused when I sat up. I heard another noise so I walked to the hallway to find the noise. As I entered the living room I saw a ghost looking at me. I then ran into my room and stayed there the rest of the night.
The chef was making a new dish. It had shrimp in it. He sauteed them and added butter. He mixed it in with pasta. The diners raved about the shrimp!
Tom's cell phone was very dated. He had it for a long time. He finally decided to buy a new one. He looked at many options. He decided to get the new iPhone.

Bob was interested in raising bees. He read several books to study beekeeping. Bob invested in beekeeping equipment. He caught a swarm and relocated them. Bob has been raising bees for several months now.

We went to the museum to see the new Mummy exhibit. It was amazing to see all these dead artifacts. They have been maintained for all these years. They showed the different processes of mummification. I was amazed and was glad to have gone.

Jeff blew up a cherry bomb in the boy's bathroom at school. He was able to get away without being caught. The cherry bomb ruined some of the pipework. The school had to call a plumber. The school was closed while repairs were underway.

Will was looking for a new shirt. He went to walmart and picked out a rolling stone shirt. He saw that there was a coupon on the shirt. The shirt has a free subscription to the magazine. He was excited and bought the shirt.
Lisa graduated college last year. She all the sudden got a phone call. It was a phone call from the student loan agency. Lisa groaned. She knew she had to get a job soon to pay for it.

She was supposed to be at work but was at home sick. She had nothing else to do but to flip through the channels. One channel was playing Christmas movies. She liked those kinds of movies but not at this time of year. To be thinking of Christmas in July made her feel very depressed.
The family took a cruise through the Mediterranean. They saw amazing historical sights. The beaches were beautiful. The food was delicious. They went home and couldn't wait to go on another trip!

Tim wanted to mail a gift to his mom in a different state. He lost his mom's mailing address. He called her to ask for it but it went to her voicemail. Tim realized he was in a timezone five hours ahead. Tim left an apology in her voicemail and promised to call her later.

Sally planned to prank her best friend Jenny. She blew up lots of balloons and stuffed them in bags. She found Jenny's car in the parking lot. She filled Jenny's car with all the balloons. She watched when Jenny opened her car and balloons spilled out.
Tim was with friends at the pool. They wanted to have a cannonball challenge. Biggest splash won the contest. Nobody wanted Tim to play but he joined anyway. He was fatter and won easily.

Frankie was riding his bike home from school. He always got off of it to walk it across the street. As he was walking he saw a car coming right at him. He dropped the bike and ran, the car destroying his bike. The guy driving felt so bad, he wrote Frankie a thousand dollar check.
Kelly loved trying new recipes on her friends. She made a deep dish pizza for them. Mark liked the pizza so much that he ate five slices. Mark got very sick. Mark had to be taken home to recover.
Sam was on a date. When the bill came he went to grab it. His date did too. They decided to split it. Sam appreciated the effort.

Ron wants to find something to do this afternoon. He decides to play his guitar for a while. Ron plays three songs that he loves. After playing he feels much better. Ron is glad that he found something to do.

Wendy was happy to hear of the annual turtle race at her summer camp. She was lucky to find a turtle on a rock near the lake. She marked him with chalk and named him Elmer. Elmer won his race! Wendy was so excited to write of his victory to her mother and father.
Sam loves sandwiches. He asked Jordan to eat lunch with him. Jordan agreed. Sam and Jordan made different types of sandwiches. Sam and Jordan ate the sandwiches for lunch,

Timmy got a check in the mail for his birthday. He took it to the grocery store but they couldn't cash it. Timmy tried to find a location to cash his check in town. He eventually found a branch for his bank and walked in. They cashed his check and Timmy took his money home.

Jack went to buy a fur coat. He told the store clerk that he wanted a black coat with fur trim. The store owner told him that fur is murder, and said get out. Jack went to a different store. The other store found him a coat made of fur and he was happy.

Gina's friend Mary was jealous of Gina's new book. So Gina made it a point to be seen with the book as much as possible. Mary and her other friends began to work on their math assignment. Gina continued to peruse her new book. She could tell she was getting under Mary's skin.

Hunter was on a road trip to his brothers wedding. Things were going well until his car broke down. His car was going to take a couple of days to repair. That left Hunter less than 24 hours to drive to his brothers wedding. Luckily, Hunter made it there in the knick of time.

My brother's brother in law collapsed one day. He had post polio syndrome. He needed a tube in his stomach and a catheter to his bladder. He was in a nursing home for two months, but got released. He recently had the tube and catheter removed.

Jim called the u-haul support line. Someone answered his call but the ringing didn't stop. His phone kept making the ringing sound as they talked. Jim found it incredibly annoying. He made an effort to get off the phone as quickly as possible.
Jimmy was practicing with his punching back. After landing a new jabs, the bag moved. However, the chain holding it broke. As a result, it landed on Jimmy. His leg was fractured.

I set out to walk to the bank yesterday. The shortest route was blocked because the road was closed. I had to walk three blocks out of my way. I finally arrived at the bank. I discovered a more scenic route home.

Theo watched his pet hawk flying from afar. He shouted a word and the hawk dove. It tackled the grey fox running along the plains. The hawk killed the fox and waited for it's master. Theo skinned the fox and thanked his pet hawk for the hunt.

Keith was deciding whether he wanted a new car or not. Then his old car broke down on the highway. Keith was fed up with the situation. He went straight to the dealership in a tow truck. He went and bought the first car he saw.

Susan was playing poker with her friends. Susan was on a lucky streak and began to win hand after hand. Her friends were becoming agitated. Susan eventually took everybody's money. Afterwards, Susan bought pizza for everybody with her earnings.
I just booked my first vacation. I am going to Disney World with my daughter. I plan on surprising her for her birthday. She has always wanted to go. She is going to be so excited.

Stanley bought Pam a toaster for her wedding to Roy. The wedding was called off, so Pam returned the toaster to Stanley. Stanley tried to return the toaster to the store where he bought it. He was unable to do this, as the store no longer carried that toaster. Now, Stanley's house has two toasters.
Tom was reading to his kids before bedtime. He got pretty into it himself. Before he was done his kids had fallen asleep. Tom wanted to know the ending. He kept reading through to the end.
Robert was a rude co worker. He would constantly belittle his companions. One day he was running a late shift. On his way out he discovered something was wrong with his car. His tires were slashed.

Amanda was taking a pain medication for a headache. She had taken a caffeine pill earlier in the day. She decided to take extra pain pills because she was still hurting. The combination of these medications made her have a seizure! When she recovered, she vowed to never again take too many pills.

Every morning Ernie reads the newspaper. This was his routine every morning. The paper wasn't at his front door like it always is. He decided to look outside. To his surprise, the neighbors dog had stole the newspaper.

When Johnny's car broke on the highway, he was stumped. It was raining very hard and he was far away from a gas station. He waved for someone to stop. A big truck stopped and took him along. When he came back it was dark, but the car got fixed and he left.

Jane could not find the last egg from the hunt. She searched everywhere. One day she smelled a horrible odor. She started to walk around the yard. She looked up and in the hanging basket was the last Easter egg.

Tabitha was a summer camp director. She was trying to plan for a campfire sing-along. Unfortunately she couldn't come up with enough songs. Then she had the idea to write parodies of popular songs. Soon she had ten camp-themed parodies the kids loved to sing.

Tim saw a streak run by him. It was a man being chased by the police! They ran as fast as they could, yelling at the man to stop. They tackled him and arrested him. It was the most exciting thing Tim had ever seen!
I walked outside, and looked up at the sky. The moon was very bright. I ran back in to get my camera. I took several pictures of the moon. I edited them, and kept them as a memory.
I got a pedicure yesterday. The moment I sat down it was strange. I started to squeal. My feet were very ticklish. I did not like the feeling.
Allie needed a good grade. She needed it to move up a level. But when she got her test back she failed. She didn't know what to do. She broke down crying.

Tom used his phone's alarm to wake up. One morning he realized the alarm never went off. Tom's phone had died even though he had it plugged in. Tom realized the charger was broken. He replaced it as soon as possible.
I have to take a statistics course for my major. It's extremely difficult. I think I'm in danger of failing. I have decided to seek a tutor. I just hope the tutor is clearer than the professor.
Ryan was in the school band. The band was having tryouts for a solo trumpet player. Ryan began to practice for the part. Ryan tried out for the solo. He was given the part.

Robin wants to be an actress. She goes to audition for the part in a movie. She is told she ways too much for the part. Robin hits the gym and loses a bunch of weight. She comes back to the movie studio and claims the part.

Today was a big day. Today was Jennifer's first chance to dive after taking her classes. She went out on a boat with her friends and they got their gear ready. They were over the reef and dropped down into the water. The coral and the fish were all so beautiful underwater scuba diving.

I recently finished reading Infinite Jest. It is a big, heavy novel. I bought it new, but spilled coffee on the edges. I tried to sell it on Amazon with a note about the condition. Surprisingly, I sold the book.

Lisa wanted to read a book. She went to the library to find a good one. Lisa checked out a horror novel by Stephen King. She started to read the book just before bedtime. Lisa had terrible nightmares.

Peter and Mary went ice skating one day. Mary fell and Peter had to help her off the ice. It turns out that Mary had turned her ankle. Peter took her to the doctor. Mary is happy to have a good friend like Peter.

Susie wanted to dress herself for her first day of school. She picked out a pretty dress to wear. Her mother only helped with brushing her hair. Susie also wanted to wear some of her play makeup. She failed to notice how the makeup rubbed off on the dresses collar.
Kate bought a new bird bath. Unfortunately it didn't attract any birds. It only attracted raccoon. Kate gave it a chance for a while but nothing changed. She got rid of it eventually.
Susie wanted something different. She wanted to change her hairstyle. So she decided to get a curling iron. She made her hair into perfect curls. She then got compliments everywhere.

Elle was a very shy high school girl. She made a video of herself singing pop tunes. Elle uploaded the video to Youtube. Soon after that, Elle got a call from a record producer. Now Elle is working on an album in a professional studio!
John had a problem,he was a thief. John saw  money his mother had left on the table. John took it for snacks. There was no money for dinner. Jack's snacks became his dinner.

Yesterday we went to Tanglewood, 120 miles away. I am disabled and do not drive well. We hired a limo service, which arrived 15 minutes late. The ac broke down during the trip. We were very hot and not pleased with the service.

Mary loved animals of all kinds. Her favorite animal though, was the duck. She loved how the duck ate her bread. One day, she found a baby duck on the street. Mary adopted the duck and kept it very healthy.
Ivan was playing outside. But he saw a small puppy by itself. He decided to carry it. But its owner saw him. He and Ivan decided to play with the puppy together.
Neil took a trip to Seneca. There, he gambled in their famous Casino. He even won five hundred dollars! Then he enjoyed a Native American dinner. Neil knew he would remember Seneca forever!
I've been poor all my life. All I could afford to eat was Ramen. I won the lottery last month. I bought a huge house and a fabulous car. To top it off I bought many crates of Ramen.

Kate and her nephew were playing a zombie video game. At first Kate only played so her nephew had some company. But after awhile she was enjoying the game herself. Kate her nephew ended up spending hours playing the game. By the end of the day Kate was hooked on the video game.

The motorcycle act began simply enough with wheelies. Burt and Julie clapped and whistled. Then two motorcycles rode into a giant metal structure. They riders drove on ramps in the cage and performing tricks. When it ended, Julie and Burt had cheered until they were hoarse.

Dan's well had gone dry and he wanted to figure out why. He called out a company to check it out. They told him the side casings had fell in. Dan didn't have the money to fix it. He put in a cistern instead.

Markus worked at a coffee shop. He was determined to make the best latte. He practiced every time he worked. Finally, he was sure he had done it. However, when his boss tried it, she said he needed to practice more.

My friend Dave is ninety nine years old. Yesterday he asked if I had children. I told him he has asked that question several times over. He told me he forgets some things. His daughter told me the family is concerned about dementia.
Allie and her friends went to Vegas. They wanted to make some money. Allie sat at the slot machine for an hour. She ended up making a hundred dollars. Allie was thrilled.

Yolanda was annoyed by the constant buzzing sound she was hearing. She decided to find out what it was. She searched around her house for similar sounds. But she gave up when she couldn't find any. After going to the doctor later that day, she found out it's tinnitus!

We had a great view of the fireworks. The fireworks went off with no one else around. There was room to spread out. All of the lifeguards got to sit in the water park. Everyone else was in a field nearby.

Emily has a long list of things to do. No matter how fast she works, she can never finish the whole list. Emily had to finish the list by today. Emily got help from a friend. Emily finally finished her to do list.

Bob wanted to drink smoothies more often. So he bought a high quality blender. But the it was so loud that he had to wear ear plugs while using it. And he began hate using his new blender. Bob was no longer interested in smoothies and sold the blender.
Tim buys a new toaster. But the toaster is defective. So he brings it back to the store where he bought it. He buys a name brand toaster. The new toaster works great.

Glen was hired to design the exterior of a building. He went home and designed a very ambitious design. He took it to the company and they loved it. They began construction on Glen's design. After the building was done, Glen received a lot of attention.

Serena was arguing with her mom. She was insisting that Serena had lied about walking the dog. Serena was completely insulted that her mom wouldn't believe her. She told her mom that her feelings were hurt. Luckily, her mom calmed down and decided to give her a chance.

All night long he was struggling. The tune was in his head, but he just couldn't get it out. Writing notes, erasing them, and re-writing again he made progress. Finally he was finished after months of working. It was a masterpiece.

She knew she couldn't do this anymore. She had given him everything inside of her. She sat down wearily, wanting to just give up. She decided she needed to tell him. She would end the relationship today.
Tyler has a big test coming up. Instead of studying he has fun with his friends. The day of the test comes. Tyler does his best even though he didn't study. Tyler fails his test.
Lilly painted a picture of pizza. One piece of pizza was missing. Mom asked her who ate the pizza slice. Lily answered she did. They both laughed.

Cal's alarm clock rang out at the time he had set. But Cal was very tired from staying up too late. He meant to hit the snooze button. Cal turned off the alarm clock instead. He woke up very late and was late to work.

Shane and his family had just moved into a new house. All of the kids were checking it out. Shane found the bedroom that he wanted, but his brother followed him. His brother also wanted the room, and a fight broke out. Their mom appeared and decided to give the room to their sister.

Peter saw a dog walking around outside. He went to see if it was a stray. But the dog approached him eagerly, and Tim saw something. It had a collar with its owner's name and address on it! Tim returned the dog to its frantic, grateful owner.

Abby was a troublemaker. She broke the law and got arrested. They took her to jail and she was locked up. Abby regretted the things she had done. She promised she would be better when they released her.

Tim had dedicated his life to teaching. He had been a teacher for over 40 years. The day had come and he announced to all his students he will retire. Tim gets a bunch of hugs from all of his students. Tim is sad but knows his time as a teacher is over.

My frequent heartburn gradually became reflux and acid indigestion. I took Mylanta occasionally and tried to ignore it, feeling too busy. When it was constant pain in my gut, I admitted I had a gastric ulcer. I finally took time to listen to what my body was telling me. My health demanded I delegate stressful tasks and allow play time.

Wes had dirty carpet in his living room. He paid a carpet cleaning person to come to his home. The carpet cleaner quickly removed all of the dirt. Wes was amazed how plush and clean the carpet looked. He decided he would hire carpet cleaners more often.

Kelsey was obsessed with mermaids. She loved them dearly since she was a kid. She just got laid off and needed work ideas. Immediately, she decided to apply to be a paid mermaid for parties. She got the job and enjoyed living out her dreams.
my family was poor. if you wanted anything, you had to get it yourself. i wanted a car. i worked hard for two Year's. i saved enough to buy my own car.

Marty hated her varicose veins. She thought that they made her legs look like road maps. She went to the doctor to see what could be done. He recommended surgery, but Marty was afraid of surgery. She decided just to accept her hideously ugly legs.

Will's car wouldn't start after work. Will didn't live far from the office. So Will decided just to walk home, as the evening was nice. Will began doing this on a regular basis. Now Bill walks to and from work every single day!

Dave is a mailman. He works at the same post office as my husband. Whenever there is a lot of work he calls out repeatedly. He's earned his pension but is too young to retire. But at least when he calls out my husband gets more hours.

Jill went to the doctor for a routine check up. What they found was devastating. They told Jill it was Cancer. Jill was in complete shock over the news. Jill vowed to beat this sickness and overcome it all.
